>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.hIhgdXnqGHBm0A64]{Envoy Improvisation}

Not only are you ready to risk yourself to protect others—your sacrifice also inspires your companion. You gain @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.1auTCZ8OB64XqXcZ]{Bodyguard} as a bonus feat. If you already have Bodyguard, you instead gain @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.feats.zOvuXKOIFXBJIMT6]{In Harm’s Way} as a bonus feat. If you use In Harm’s Way to intercept an attack that then reduces you to 0 Hit Points, you grant the attack’s original target a +1 morale bonus to AC, attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks, as well as a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your envoy level + your Charisma modifier. These benefits last for a number of rounds equal to your Charisma modifier or until you regain consciousness, whichever happens first.
